headline: Reassessing Constellation Brands Valuation After a 37.2% Slide in 2025
summary: Wondering if Constellation Brands is quietly turning into a value opportunity after a rough stretch? This is where we unpack whether the current price really reflects the business behind the ticker. The stock has slipped 6.6% over the last week but is still up 7.0% over the past month. Those short term moves sit against a much steeper slide of around 37.2% year to date. Investors have been reacting to a mix of headlines around consumer demand shifts in beer, wine, and spirits, plus ongoing...
